speaker: Alice
content: The morning after my funeral, my friends and neighbors quietly went back to their busy, busy lives.

speaker: Alice
content: While some did their cooking. And some did their cleaning. And some did their yoga. Others did their "homework"

speaker: Julie
content: Hi, I'm Julie. I kicked my soccer ball into your backyard.

speaker: Mike
content: Oh, OK. Well, let's go around and get it.
mark: let's go round/around and get it 咱们过去把它拿过来,可以用于提议去某个地方拿取某样东西等情景中。around 是美式

speaker: Julie
content: His wife died a year ago. He wanted to stay in LA, but there were too many memories. He is renting for tax purposes, but He hopes to buy a place real soon.
mark: tax purposes 纳税目的  tax 税款；负担，重负  purposes 目的，意图；目标，计划
for other purposes 为了其他目的；for specific purposes为了特定目的
real soon 真快：表示某事将会很快发生或完成。

speaker: Susan
content: I can't believe you went over there.

speaker: Julie
content: Hey, I saw you both flirting at the wake. You are obviously into each other. Now that you know he is single, you can ask him out.
mark: you both = you two 你们两个
flirt 调情；不认真地考虑
you are into each other 你们喜欢对方

speaker: Susan
content: Julie, I like Mr. Delfino, I do. I just... I don't even know if I'm ready to start dating yet.

speaker: Julie
content: You need to get back out there. Come on. How long has it been since you had sex? Are you mad that I asked you that?
mark: get back out there 重新开始；继续前进；再次尝试
How long has it been since... 自从…… 以来已经多久了,回答时通常会用类似 “It's been + 时间段”

speaker: Susan
content: No, I'm just trying to remember. I don't wanna talk to you about my love life anymore. It weirds me out.
mark: wanna 想要（等于 want to）
It weirds me out 这让我很奇怪

speaker: Julie
content: I wouldn't have said anything. It's just...
mark: I wouldn't have said anything. It's just...  我本不想说什么，只是…

speaker: Julie
content: I heard Dad's girlfriend ask if you'd dated anyone since the divorce. And Dad said he doubted it. And then they both laughed.
mark: hear sb do sth 听见某人做某事, 其中do sth是不带 to 的不定式
Dad said he doubted it. 在间接引语中，当主句的谓语动词是过去时态（said）时，从句中的动词通常也要使用相应的过去时态来保持时态的一致性。
